spec_data.Name: pam-devel
spec_data.Description:
PAM (Pluggable Authentication Modules) is a system security tool that
allows system administrators to set authentication policy without
having to recompile programs that handle authentication. This package
contains header files used for building both PAM-aware applications
and modules for use with the PAM system.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 21 Aug 2017 11:11:22 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Files needed for developing PAM-aware applications and modules for PAM
